title: Aural set, voice and lute - meter ID

content.question: Which of the following best represents the meter of the excerpt?

choices.label: The figure presents the first option, option A of question number 7. The option is: A meter of two four time.
The figure presents the second option, option B of question number 7. The option is: A meter of three four time.
The figure presents the third option, option C of question number 7. The option is: A meter of four four time.
The figure presents the fourth option, Option D of question number 7. The option is: A meter of five four time.

content.answer: The figure presents the second option, option B of question number 7. The option is: A meter of three four time.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
